app.name: Zendesk Healthcheck
app.short_description: Comprehensive health check and monitoring for your Zendesk instance
app.long_description:
Monitor and maintain your Zendesk instance's health with automated checks for configuration issues, best practices, and potential problems. Get detailed reports on tickets, users, organizations, macros, triggers, and more.

Features:
- Automated health checks
- Detailed issue reporting
- Configuration monitoring
- Best practice recommendations
app.installation_instructions:
1. Enter your Zendesk admin email address
2. Generate and enter an API token from your Zendesk admin settings
3. Click install to complete setup

admin_email.label: Admin Email (for API call)
admin_email.helpText: Enter the email address of a Zendesk admin account that will be used for API calls

api_token.label: API Token
api_token.helpText: Enter your Zendesk API token. You can generate this from your admin settings
